alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Phillips County through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Watkins Corner, or 7 miles southwest of Marvell, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Watkins Corner, Lake View, Poplar Grove, Oneida, Barton, Kindall, Turkey Scratch, Kingtown, Gobell, Spring Creek, Trenton, Cypert and Delta Heritage Trails State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
